snippet: A federal appeals court struck down as unconstitutional several gun registration laws in the nation’s capital, but upheld other restrictions.
abstract: Federal appeals court rejects as unconstitutional several Washington, DC, gun registration laws; court upholds six gun laws intended to protect public safety, and strikes down a total of four.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court struck down as unconstitutional several gun registration laws in the nation’s capital, but upheld other restrictions.

headline.main: Court Gives Mixed Decision on Gun Ownership Laws
headline.print_headline: Court Gives Mixed Decision on Gun Ownership Laws
